DOC.brief_summary: Objective : To demonstrate well-being Chinese term infant feed Wondersun formula high proportion palmitic acid sn-2 position . Design & setting : A single-center , open label study . A breast fed group serve reference . The study conduct Guangzhou 2010.1~2010.12 . Participants : 0-14 whole formula-fed infant whole breast-fed infant , 30 infant group . They require healthy , term-infant , normal birth weight , medication know affect growth development . Intervention : The formula-fed infant feed Wondersun formula high proportion palmitic acid sn-2 position ; breast-fed group feed use breast milk least 3 month . Outcome measure : Tolerance efficacy assess body measurement , stool characteristic questionnaire , general health examination , behavior habit questionnaire baseline ( 0-14d ) , 6 week 12 week . Safety also evaluate . Statistical analysis : t-test , rank test chi-square test use examine significance change baseline follow-up visit formula-fed breast-fed group effectiveness measure
DOC.brief_title: Tolerance Efficacy Wondersun Infant Formula Formula-fed Chinese Term Infants
DOC.criteria: Parental/legal guardian write informed consent . The mother unequivocally decide breastfeed ( formula feed infant ) breastfeed ( human milk feed infant ) . Term infant Chinese origin born 3742 gestation week determine menstrual history corroborate prenatal UnltraSound ( US ) and/or physical examination . Birth weight appropriate gestational age ( AGA ) , 25004000g ( 10th~ 90th percentile body weight gestation age ) . The infant apparent healthy birth entry study . Apgar 5 minute > 7 . Enrolled within first 14 day birth . The infant product normal pregnancy delivery include Csection . Patental ability attend visit , interview willing fill questionnaire . Mother health condition : ( psychological physical ) socioeconomic problem may interfere mother 's ability take care infant . The infant suffers major congenital abnormality chromosomal disorder clinical significance detect birth . The infant suffers/ed disease require mechanical ventilation medication treatment first week birth . The infant suffers suspect know metabolic physical limitation interfere feed normal metabolism ( require special formula ) . The infant carry HBV ( HBsAb positive ) .
